desc: Nestle Rallies' nut butter bombs let you indulge in a dessert that balances 3 creamy nut butter flavors dipped in chocolate that give you a smooth, sweet & decadent experience with all of the flavor & sweet decadence with zero preservatives, artificial flavors or colors.

layout.text:
Hi, rallies™ here...
we’re a new chocolate
nut butter bomb,
hanging out in the
fridge, and we’d love
to meet in person.
